level.text: Any member, contributor, or recipient of expenditures involving a minor party may request an exemption from the disclosure provisions of this title.
The requestor shall apply, in writing, to the Director.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 3161, 3198-99 (May 22, 1998); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1402 (February 8, 2013).
